sources.description:
Chuck Scott, a penniless war veteran haunted by nightmares, becomes chauffeur to gangster Eddie Roman after returning his lost wallet.  Falling in love with Roman's imprisoned wife, Chuck gets entangled in a dangerous web of deceit and murder as he strives to clear his name and escape with her to Cuba.

Original title: The Chase (1946)

B&W version https://youtu.be/fR3gujz-PiM

Director: Arthur Ripley
Writers: Philip Yordan, Cornell Woolrich
Genres: Classics, Crime, Film-Noir, Thriller
